game_description: LUNA: EPISODE 1 - LEFT BEHIND is a 30 minute interactive VR story about an android and a little girl trying to survive an AI apocalypse. The machines seem to be after only one goal: to exterminate its creators. You, a small commercial droid, wake up and find your system to be reset. Can you, a droid with no combat capabilities, protect Luna? Can humanity be saved? Features: - Talk to the characters. LUNA uses speech recognition to help you immerse in the story and connect with the characters. - Dialogue options will guide you through the story while letting you make meaningful decisions that impact the ending. - Prepare for an emotional ride. The story is full of heart-warming and uplifting moments. Official Selection - Cannes XR 2022 Official Selection - Kaohsiung Film Festival 2022 Ranked #7 in Best Rated Quest Games in App Lab by RoadToVR
